identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a top 1% tactical gaming hub that feels like a military-grade control center mixed with cyberpunk noir.
principles: Fusion: Military Precision x Cyberpunk Glitch
Content: Data is ammo. Display it with lethal clarity.
Contrast: Void Black vs. Laser Red

layout.spacing: Generous padding (p-8, p-12) to create a 'high-tech facility' feel.

buttons.classes: rounded-none border border-red-600/50 hover:bg-red-900/20 hover:border-red-500 transition-all duration-300 uppercase tracking-widest font-['Rajdhani']

cards.classes: bg-black/40 border border-white/10 backdrop-blur-md rounded-sm relative overflow-hidden group hover:border-red-500/30 transition-colors

hero_background.usage: Main landing page background with heavy dark overlay

server_status_bg.usage: Background for the live server status widget

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to the <head> of index.html immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to extend the font family with 'Rajdhani' and 'JetBrains Mono'.
3. CSS VARIABLES: Overwrite the :root and .dark variables in index.css with the provided color palette. FORCE DARK MODE by default.
4. SHADCN: When using Shadcn components, strip the 'rounded-md' classes. We want sharp, brutalist edges (rounded-none or rounded-sm).
5. SERVER STATUS: This is the crown jewel. Make it look like a heartbeat monitor. Use the 'server_status_bg' image with a red overlay.
6. BANLIST: Style this as a 'Criminal Record' database. Use monospaced font for IPs and SteamIDs.
7. RANKINGS: Top 3 players get special 'Wanted' poster styling.
8. ADMIN PANEL: Must feel like a 'Restricted Access' area. Use heavy red borders and 'Access Denied' aesthetics for non-admins.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors or noise textures.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state that changes border color or background opacity.
Use 'lucide-react' for icons. Pick sharp, geometric icons (e.g., 'Shield', 'Crosshair', 'Terminal').
